Articles.Content:
In just 1 week Kerbin City was already available for download, and this is almost 2 months old and there isn't a download or any sign of progress available

This is highly detailed, and isn't a community project...

This is highly detailed, and isn't a community project...

They can still show something of their progress, even if it's just a couple of buildings
I was thinking of putting together a HD buildings pack for KerbTown, would that be something you guys would like?

Has this died, or is everyone just on a well deserved holiday?

Yes, I was on holidays.

BTW I've been really impressed by the Kerbin City project.

Actually, I'm working on another KSP project (Long March 2F rocket mod) and I will wait about Kerbin City evolution.

If Kerbin City, in the future, don't do what I wanted for Konstructions, I will work on it again.

So the project isn't die, it is in standby.
